entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature rising to 13 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 50 to 70 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature rising to 13 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
